sentence: PERINO: Well, that was -- that was two very vulnerable Democrats, Mark Kelly and Maggie Hassan from New Hampshire and Arizona, because they realize that they got to do something because they have to find a way to separate themselves from President Biden.
title: 'The Five' on Democrats taking all the credit

sentence: Catherine Cortez-Masto (D-NV); Michael Bennet (D-CO); Mark Kelly (D-AZ); Maggie Hassan (D-NH); Joe Manchin (D-WV); Kyrsten Sinema (D-AZ); Jon Tester (D-MT) and Jacky Rosen (D-NV).
author: Kipp Jones
title: Multiple Democratic Lawmakers Pivot on Mandates Before Midterms: ‘I’m Completely Over Mask Mandates’

sentence: Joe Manchin III of West Virginia; Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly, both of Arizona; Jon Tester of Montana; Catherine Cortez-Masto and Jacky Rosen, both of Nevada; Michael Bennet of Colorado and Maggie Hassan of New Hampshire voted for the resolution.
author: Mica Soellner
title: DCCC chair says he is ‘completely over’ mask mandates
